thread.title: Nigel Taylor
thread.title_full: Kenya Visa Online reviewed by Nigel Taylor

author: Nigel Taylor
title: Nigel Taylor
text:
I use this service everytime I go to Kenya, 3-4 times a year. It is reliable, fast and efficient and no more expensive than others. I will continue to use this service and recommend it to others.
The only improvement I can think of is the ability to store you details
